import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Datepicker from "./Datepicker.js" import axios from "axios" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const TodoList = () => { const [todoTitle, setTodoTitle] = useState(""); const [todoDescription, setTodoDescription] = useState(""); const [todoDeadline, setTodoDeadline] = useState(""); const [todoUserid, setTodoUserid] = useState(""); const navigate = useNavigate(); const saveTodo = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); try { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/todos',{ todoTitle, todoDescription, todoDeadline, todoUserid }); navigate("/"); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } return (
